DESCRIPTION:
- This command will drop 3 cards and can be used every 8 minutes.
- Use the command `sdn` to drop cards without images. This is helpful to preserve mobile data or to avoid lag.
EXTRA_GRAB_ALERT: {{author}} Your **Extra Drop** is being used. You have`{{remaining}}` remaining.
BUY_DROP: You can also `Vote` to buy `Drops` - `sbuy drop`
